name: Hi, My name is Athul.
short_summary: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer & I love Designing things.
about: I'm a full-stack web developer and UI/UX designer. I'm also familiar with Android development in Kotlin. I started learning to program because I love building cool apps. Drawing and video games are my hobbies, I consider development as an art and I always create my works based on that.
quote: Here is a cool 3D model using JavaScript.
